articles.title: DWUK Calls on S. Korean Women to Struggle against S. Korean Regime
articles.content:
DWUK Calls on S. Korean Women to Struggle against S. Korean Regime
 Pyongyang, November 25 (KCNA) -- The spokeswoman for the Central Committee of the Democratic Women's Union of Korea (DWUK) Monday released a statement calling on the south Korean women to come out in the struggle to put an end to the fascist dictatorial rule of the puppet conservative group.
					 The statement said that the departed soul of ill-famed "yusin" is now riding roughshod in south Korea after being brought back though it had faced a stern punishment by history and had been buried in its grave.
					
					 It bitterly condemned the puppet group for its undemocratic acts of brutally suppressing the progressive and democratic forces out in their actions for social progress and democracy and wantonly trampling down the freedom and rights to conduct political activities.
					
					 It said:
					
					 The "yusin" dictatorship forced so many mothers in south Korea to shed blood and tears, bringing so much pain to them. If such dictatorship is allowed to reemerge there, it will be hard to expect happiness of families, future of their children and social democracy.
					
					 If the south Koreans yield to the last-ditch harsh suppression by the fascist group, they will bring to naught the results of the bloody struggle they have waged for the last several decades and will be deprived of even elementary democratic rights as human beings in dark society under the reign of all sorts of injustice and tyranny.
					
					 The fascist dictators swimming against the trend of the times and turning their back on the people can never go scot-free.
					
					 The DWUK Central Committee is firmly convinced that broad social strata of women in south Korea will firmly join hands with other people in actions for social progress, democracy and reunification and courageously turn out in the sacred struggle to decisively foil the moves of the conservative ruling forces to stifle the progressive and democratic forces and bring a new democratic society and usher in the morning of reunification.

articles.title: Delegation of Ugandan National Women's Council Here
articles.content:
Delegation of Ugandan National Women's Council Here
Pyongyang, November 25 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Ugandan National Women's Council headed by acting Chairperson Pauline Kirasha arrived here on Monday.

articles.title: National Meeting for Supporting Korea's Reunification Held in Japan
articles.content:
National Meeting for Supporting Korea's Reunification Held in Japan
 Pyongyang, November 25 (KCNA) -- The 31st national meeting of the movement for supporting Korea's reunification took place in Fukuoka Prefecture, Japan on November 17.
					 Present there were Fumihiro Himori, chairman of the Japan Committee for Supporting the Independent and Peaceful Reunification of Korea, members of the committee, members of the executive committee of the national meeting and representatives from the friendship organizations in different parts of Japan.
					
					 Present there on invitation were Nam Sung U, vice-chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon), and other officials of Chongryon.
					
					 Introduced there were messages from the Korean Society for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries and the Korean Friendship Association headquartered in Spain, the British Friendship Society with Korea and the Philippines Solidarity Committee for Peace and Reunification in the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 Kenji Mizutani, secretary general of the Japan Committee for Supporting the Independent and Peaceful Reunification of Korea, in his keynote address denounced the Japanese government for its evermore undisguised discrimination and suppression of the Koreans in Japan and called on the Japanese people to make a tangible contribution to the peaceful reunification of Korea and the normalization of diplomatic relations between Japan and the DPRK.
					
					 Then followed a lecture on the subject "For the conclusion of peace agreement and normalization of diplomatic relations between Japan and the DPRK." Speakers laid bare the hostile acts of Japan and the south Korean regime against the DPRK and the Seoul authorities' unreasonable campaign to stifle a progressive political party and stressed the need to improve the north-south relations and the relations between Japan and the DPRK.
					
					 The meeting denounced the south Korean authorities for their fascist action against the progressive forces and adopted an appeal demanding the U.S. replace the Korean Armistice Agreement with a peace treaty and Japan lift the sanctions against the DPRK.

articles.title: Achievements Made in Putting Sports on Scientific Basis
articles.content:
Achievements Made in Putting Sports on Scientific Basis
 Pyongyang, November 25 (KCNA) -- A dynamic drive for putting sports on a scientific basis is now under way at various units of the DPRK.
					 The research group of Kim Il Sung University has developed a lot of computer programs including a program for placing weightlifting trainings on a scientific basis and a program for recording results in marathon. They help put trainings and games on a scientific basis and improve skills of players.
					
					 Korea University of Physical Education, the Kwanmobong Sports Team and other units developed programs for helping archers improve their skills, making it possible to correctly estimate the physical and technical abilities of players and place trainings on a scientific basis.
					
					 A scientific foundation has been laid to produce sports apparatuses and measuring appliances locally at a high level.
					
					 Sports wear, marathon shoes, skate blades for ice hockey and figure skating and laser jump measuring appliances made by Pyongyang Han Tok Su University of Light Industry, the Ferrous Metal Research Institute of the State Academy of Sciences and Kim Chaek University of Technology are drawing attention of experts as they are fit for the constitutional characters of Korean players.
					
					 The Sports Nutrient Research Institute, Kumkop General Foodstuff Factory for Sportspersons and others are registering achievements in deepening researches into sports medicines and nutrients.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Dismisses U.S. Talk about "World without Nuclear Weapons" as Hypocritical
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Dismisses U.S. Talk about "World without Nuclear Weapons" as Hypocritical
 Pyongyang, November 25 (KCNA) -- "A world without nuclear weapons" touted by the U.S. is, in essence, the world which allows U.S. nuclear weapons only and it is a jargon let loose by it to realize its ambition for domination with its nukes.
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday says in an article:
					
					 With no rhetoric can the U.S. cover up the hypocritical idea of building "a world without nuclear weapons." 
					
					 A non-governmental organization of the U.S. disclosed this year that the U.S. administration is contemplating modernizing its nuclear arsenal by investing 60 billion U.S. dollars for 25 years to come. As a matter of fact, the U.S. is pressing forward the modernization of B-61 nuclear bombs.
					
					 It was reported that bombs can be equipped with guided devices in the course of updating.
					
					 The U.S. plans to spend 8.1 billion U.S. dollars for modernizing B-61 nuclear bombs till 2024.
					
					 The U.S. conducted a series of sub-critical nuclear tests in September and December 2010, February 2011 and December 2012. It also conducted several tests for examining the capacity of nuclear weapons using plutonium this year, too.
					
					 It is as clear as noonday why the U.S. is becoming so talkative about "a world without nuclear weapons".
					
					 The ulterior motive of Washington is to monopolize nukes or hold a decisive and unchallenged edge.
					
					 The U.S. is seeking to pass the buck for the tense situation created by the nuclear confrontation under the hypocritical slogan of "a world without nuclear weapons".
					
					 By doing so, it seeks to deter various nuclear powers from bolstering up nuclear forces, disallow other countries to have access to nukes and thus dominate the world at any cost.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Denounces South Korean Puppet Group's Confrontation Ruckus
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Denounces South Korean Puppet Group's Confrontation Ruckus
 Pyongyang, November 25 (KCNA) -- The south Korean  puppet group was closeted with the envoy for the human rights issue in north Korea of the U.S. Department of State during the latter's recent junket to south Korea, kicking up a confrontation row over the "human rights"  issue in the north. Timed to coincide with this, the security chief of Chongwadae solicited neighboring countries' support for the group's policy of confrontation, talking about "confirmation of the joint stand on denuclearization" and "common understanding".
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday observes in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 What the puppet forces uttered only reveals the wretched plight of the political servants who cannot survive even a moment without backing of foreign forces.
					
					 By origin, dependence on foreign forces is nothing but a last-ditch effort of the traitors forsaken by the nation.
					
					 The puppet group is censured at home and abroad for pursuing confrontation with compatriots and an anti-reunification policy and an unpopular rule in less than one year since it came to power.
					
					 Hit hard by all sides, the group is making desperate efforts to seek a way out by garnering support of outside forces over the nuclear issue and "human rights." 
					
					 Ridiculous is the base way of thinking of the puppet group seeking to realize its ambition for escalating the confrontation with fellow countrymen by relying on foreign forces.
					
					 Can an interaction of its American master with the puppet group improve its miserable position? However, it was so pleased by the informal agreement of outside forces that it is going upbeat, vociferous about "common understanding", unaware of their ulterior motive. This is the most unbearable shame on the nation. It is quite natural for the south Korean authorities to have such wretched plight as they have neither proper political philosophy nor correct outlook on the nation.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Group's Fascist Crackdown upon People Flayed by Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Group's Fascist Crackdown upon People Flayed
 Pyongyang, November 25 (KCNA) -- The fascist suppression can never be supported by the popular masses as it is the ruling method peculiar to dictators. Rodong Sinmun Monday says this in an article.
					 It goes on:
					
					 The brutal fascist suppression by the south Korean puppet group for mercilessly violating democracy and human rights is aimed at rendering whole society conservative  by reviving the "yusin" dictatorship in south Korea and freely pursuing its treacherous policy on this basis. Herein lies its criminal objective.
					
					 As soon as the group came to power through all sorts of irregularities and frauds, the present puppet regime established one-person ruling system, a copy of the "yusin" dictatorial system, and more frantically invoked the "Security Law," resorting to brutal fascist crackdown upon the people. 
					
					 Its anachronistic and treacherous policy is touching off grudge and anger among south Koreans from all walks of life. The steadily sinking support rate of the present chief executive is an indication of a stern warning to her keen to revive the "yusin" dictatorship. 
					
					 History and the present situation in south Korea go to prove that all dictators hell-bent on fascist suppression could not escape a miserable end.
					
					 The successive country-selling rulers of south Korea were the dictators who stayed in power through their fascist crackdown upon people. However, tyrants were short-lived.
					
					 With no frenzy can the old overpower the new and with no desperate efforts can injustice prevail over justice. It is inevitable that progress and justice are sure to triumph.

articles.title: Japanese Politician's Absurd Remarks over Sexual Slavery Denounced
articles.content:
Japanese Politician's Absurd Remarks over Sexual Slavery Denounced
 Pyongyang, November 25 (KCNA) -- Mayor of Osaka Hashimoto who is co-head of the Japan Restoration Party, recently let loose rubbish that sexual slavery issue existed in the period of war in different parts of the world. This shows that he is discontent with the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army that has been frequently raised, given that such crimes are committed by armies of other countries during wars.
					 This is tantamount to his admittance of the existence of the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army in the past and its gravity, says Rodong Sinmun Monday in a commentary.
					
					 He tried to compare the crimes related to the sexual slavery committed by Japan to those committed by armies of other countries. This only resulted in his admittance of the Japanese imperialists' crimes and their responsibilities, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 Crimes related to the sexual slavery during the wars are hideous crimes against humanity that deserve punishment by criminal law. International law defines mental and spiritual damage to civilians as crimes of massacre, and acts of turning civilians into slaves, practicing tortures against them and forcing them into prostitution as crimes against humanity.
					
					 But the crimes related to the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army differs from what was committed by the aggression armies of other countries in their nature.
					
					 The sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army was institutionalized in the past. The Japanese government and military were what directly organized and executed it. Japan reduced 200 000 Korean women into sexual slaves. This would have been unthinkable apart from the Japanese imperialists' military fascist suppression system under which all civilians were under strict control ranging from the capital to the lowest administrative unit.
					
					 In the light of all these historical facts and the gravity of the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army the Japanese politicians have no face to take issue with other countries. It would be proper for them to repent of and make reparations for the past crimes committed by their country.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Group's Suppression of Progressive Forces under Fire
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Group's Suppression of Progressive Forces under Fire
 Pyongyang, November 25 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet group is getting more reckless in its suppression of the progressive forces in a bid to divert elsewhere public criticism of it, much upset by the daily disclosure of the truth about the interference of power organs in the election.
					 According to what was disclosed by a lawmaker on Nov. 20, the group is scheming to take a legal action against 15 persons for the mere reason that they had access to the website of the north "By our nation itself." 
					
					 The group is contemplating such step, claiming that they are likely to benefit the enemy and they cannot be considered otherwise than forces to bring down the social system.
					
					 As already known, as soon as an international group of hackers opened to public a list of subscribers to "By our nation itself", the group kicked up a wholesale whirlwind of suppression of progressive organizations and personages on the list, branding them as "spies of the north" and "forces following the north".

articles.title: U.S. Accused of Supporting Japan's Moves for Reinvasion
articles.content:
U.S. Accused of Supporting Japan's Moves for Reinvasion
Pyongyang, November 25 (KCNA) -- The People's Action for Peace against War, an organization of south Korea, released a statement on Nov. 21 accusing the U.S of supporting Japan's moves for reinvading Korea.
					The statement recalled that the U.S. held a joint meeting of diplomatic and military chiefs in Washington on Nov. 20 at which it voiced support for the moves of Japan including its examination of the exercise of "the right to collective self-defense".
					
					The statement denounced the U.S. for clarifying its will to support and cooperate with Japan in its moves to exercise the "right to collective self-defense" though it is a serious issue of stoking contradictions in Northeast Asia because these are part of the scenario for carrying out its policy for rearmament.
					
					The statement condemned Japan for justifying the war of aggression by distorting history textbooks, refusing to make any apology and reparation for its past crimes and, at the same time, stepping up its policy of reinvasion as evidenced by its moves to make the Pacifist Constitution invalid and exercise "the right to collective self-defense."
					
					It demanded the U.S. stop at once backing the moves of Japan for reinvasion in a bid to carry out its policy for hegemony.
					
					The south Korean authorities will face strong public protest if they persist in such irresponsible acts as allowing Japan to exercise "the right to collective self-defense", the statement warned.

articles.title: Actions against Revival of "Yusin" Dictatorship Urged by Korean in Russia
articles.content:
Actions against Revival of "Yusin" Dictatorship Urged by Korean in Russia
 Pyongyang, November 25 (KCNA) -- Ri Chae Son, vice-chairman of the Central Association of Korean Nationals in Russia, released a statement on Nov. 21 calling for  actions against the moves of the Park Geun Hye regime to revive the "yusin" dictatorship in south Korea.
					 The statement condemned the south Korean conservative group for working hard to eliminate all progressive political parties, organizations and media which criticize its treacherous policy and call for democracy and the implementation of the north-south joint declarations by branding them as "forces following the north" and "benefiting the enemy" just as the "yusin" dictator did.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 The group is hell-bent on stamping out the progressive and democratic forces at the point of bayonet. Lurking behind this is a sinister ploy of the group to tide over the ruling crisis caused by the disclosure of the truth about the case of the illegal interference in the election by power organs which helped the group seize power through swindles and plots during the "presidential election" last year and the actions of the people declaring the Park Geun Hye's election null and void, and to realize its ambition for long-term office.
					
					 South Korea is standing at the crossroads of whether it defends democracy or goes back to the period when the fascist tyranny swept it.
					
					 The south Koreans should never allow the revival of the "yusin" dictatorship.
					
					 Only when the revival of the "yusin" dictatorship is checked, is it possible to achieve the vital rights and democracy, improve the inter-Korean relations and ensure peace on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 The south Korean people should wage a more dynamic struggle to defend democracy and the people from all walks of life should get united and rise up as one in the struggle to realize democracy against fascist dictatorship.
					
					 All Koreans in Russia will always stand by the south Korean people in their struggle for justice and positively support them in their actions for democracy against the "yusin" dictatorship.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Lauded by Chinese Media Person
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Lauded by Chinese Media Person
 Pyongyang, November 25 (KCNA) -- Liu Ying who visited the DPRK at the head of the delegation of the All-China Journalists Association expressed deep reverence for President Kim Il Sung.
					 While staying in the DPRK, we visited Mangyongdae where Kim Il Sung, a close friend of the Chinese people, was born, Liu Ying said, and went on:
					
					 Our visit to his birthplace offered an opportunity to know well about his revolutionary career.
					
					 After embarking upon the road of revolution in his early years he liberated the country and wisely led the people to build a new country.
					
					 His family members also dedicated themselves to the country and its people.
					
					 Many people come to the birthplace and once again look back with deep emotion on his revolutionary career.
					
					 The Korean people boundlessly revere him.
					
					 The immortal exploits performed by him in the struggle for carrying out the human cause of independence will shine forever.
					
					 He fought alongside Chinese revolutionaries against the Japanese imperialists during the great anti-Japanese war.
					
					 The Korean people underwent very hard trials during the Korean war.
					
					 The armies and peoples of the two countries won a victory by fighting shoulder to shoulder in one and the same trench.
					
					 The Sino-DPRK friendship was provided by President Kim Il Sung, great leader of the Korean people, and Chinese revolutionaries of the elder generation.
					
					 The two countries have promoted the development of the Sino-DPRK friendly relations in the struggle for carrying out the common cause, fully demonstrating their vitality.
					
					 I wish the Korean people greater success in building a thriving nation under the wise guidance of supreme leader Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Introduced in Britain
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Introduced in Britain
 Pyongyang, November 25 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy posted leader Kim Jong Il's work "Socialism Is What Keeps Our People Alive" on its website on November 14. 
					 The work published on November 14, Juche 81 (1992) deals with the necessity to defend the world socialist movement and the cause of socialism and indicates the tasks for defending and advancing the cause and ways to do so.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Italy
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Italy
 Pyongyang, November 25 (KCNA) -- A committee for remembering leader Kim Jong Il was inaugurated in Rome, Italy on Nov. 18 on the occasion of the 2nd anniversary of his demise.
					 Roberto Gabriele, general secretary of the Movement for Peace and Socialism of Italy, was elected chairman of the committee.
					
					 The committee decided to give wide publicity to Kim Jong Il's undying exploits and the Korean people's successes in building a thriving nation on the occasion of the second anniversary of his demise.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Thailand
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Thailand
 Pyongyang, November 25 (KCNA) -- A committee for remembering leader Kim Jong Il was inaugurated in Thailand on Nov. 12.
					 Chanai Longoen, chairman of the Thailand-DPRK Friendship Association, was elected chairman of the committee.
					
					 The committee decided to organize diverse political and cultural events including a remembrance meeting on the occasion of the 2nd anniversary of the demise of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Anniversary of Demise of Kim Jong Il Commemorated in Benin
articles.content:
Anniversary of Demise of Kim Jong Il Commemorated in Benin
 Pyongyang, November 25 (KCNA) -- Ali Houdou, president of the Socialist Party of Benin, on November 18 made public a statement on the occasion of the second anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il. 
					 The statement said:
					
					 Kim Jong Il did not make any failure, setback and deviation while leading the Korean revolution and the world socialist movement for several decades. 
					
					 His political philosophy was the Juche idea recognized by the international community as the guiding idea of the cause of independence. 
					
					 He authored many works indicating truth and scientific accuracy of socialism and the inevitability of its victory, instilling great confidence and courage into the progressives. 
					
					 He applied the most unique political mode. 
					
					 His Songun politics not only put the DPRK on the status of a political, ideological and military power but provided a strong foundation for building an economic power. 
					
					 I pay highest tribute to him on the occasion of the second anniversary of his demise. 
					
					 Only victory and glory are in store for the Korean people who push ahead with the building of a thriving socialist nation while protecting the dignity and peace of the country under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Legends about Mt. Kumgang (10)
articles.content:
Legends about Mt. Kumgang (10)
 Pyongyang, November 25 (KCNA) -- There is a lake on a hill over 100 meters above the sea, which has been called Lake Chon in Mt. Kumgang.
					 The hill, standing in the area of scenic beauty called Pyolgumgang, tells about a legend well known among the local people.
					
					 It has been told that Pyolgumgang was especially created by God of heaven Hwanin and his son Hwanung to add beauties to Mt. Kumgang.
					
					 Both of them were mythological beings famous in Korean legends.
					
					 Out of mind to create the world's most beautiful mountain in Korea, Hwanung made Mt. Kumgang together with other gods of talents and informed his father Hwanin of his creation.
					
					 Hwanin commanded a bird's-eye-view of the mountain from heaven, before saying it was not enough to be called a famous mountain of superb scenic beauty, though it was beautiful.
					
					 Inspired by his father's opinion, Hwanung toured the whole land of Korea from Mt. Paektu in the north to Jeju Island in the southern tip, during which he found out that the land of Korea was formed with the Great Paektu Range as its mainstay and Mt. Paektu with Lake Chon on it represented the spirit of Korea.
					
					 He created a lake on the hill like Lake Chon on Mt. Paektu, surrounding it with fantastic cliffs and rocks.
					
					 Hwanin, satisfied to see the hill, offered jewels and a painting to further landscape the lake, which later turned to rocks.

articles.title: CRPP denuncia complot de DDHH anti-RPDC de EE.UU. y Sur de Corea
articles.content:
CRPP denuncia complot de DDHH anti-RPDC de EE.UU. y Sur de Corea
Pyongyang, 25 de noviembre (ACNC) -- En el tercer comite del 68o periodo de sesiones de la Asamblea General de la ONU, que tuvo lugar recientemente, Estados Unidos y otras fuerzas hostiles anti-Republica Popular Democratica de Corea fabricaron la "resolucion de derechos humanos del Norte de Corea" llena de fraudes, falsificaciones e intrigas.
					Ofreciendose como "coproponentes", los titeres surcoreanos volvieron a ponerse al frente de la fabricacion de esa resolucion que fue "aplaudida" primero por ellos mismos en cuanto "se aprobara" por la fuerza.
					
					Por otra parte, invitaron al Sur de Corea al "relator especial de DDHH" de la ONU y al "enviado especial de DDHH" del Departamento de Estado de EE.UU. para sostener debates calumniando a la RPDC y divulgo a las organizaciones internacionales un folleto llamado "informe de DDHH del Norte" como parte de su campana anti-RPDC en esa materia.
					
					El Secretariado del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria (CRPP) hizo publica el dia 24 la informacion no. 1053 condenando el suceso como otra grave provocacion politica para manchar la dignidad y la imagen de la RPDC y desestabilizar su regimen socialista.
					
					El documento senala como sigue:
					
					La campana de DDHH anti-RPDC de EE.UU. y la camarilla conservadora surcoreana no pasa de ser una artimana ridicula para encubrir el aspecto del Sur de Corea, convertido en colonia de EE.UU. e infierno para la democracia y DDHH, y para disimular la crisis interna y aplacar el descontento de la opinion publica.
					
					El criminal, que debe sentarse en el banquillo de acusado por el problema de "DDHH", es EE.UU. y los titeres surcoreanos.
					
					Serian muy equivocados si ellos piensan que pueden quebrantar, aun en lo minimo, la unidad monolitica de los militares y civiles de la RPDC con su ofensiva de ese tipo.
					
					La RPDC no tolerara nunca el complot de DDHH de EE.UU. y la banda de los titeres surcoreanos.

articles.title: Tiene lugar acto conmemorativo del 3o aniversario de victoria en combate de isla Yonphyong
articles.content:
Tiene lugar acto conmemorativo del 3o aniversario de victoria en combate de isla Yonphyong
Pyongyang, 25 de noviembre (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 23 en el distrito de Kangryong el acto conmemorativo del 3o aniversario de la victoria en el combate de fuego artillero en la isla Yonphyong.
					Participaron aqui los oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea, los funcionarios y habitantes del distrito. 
					
					Los trabajadores y ninos escolares locales felicitaron calidamente a los combatientes ameritados en esa batalla con ramos y collares de flores. 
					
					Al hacer uso de la palabra, el jefe del 4o cuerpo del EPC, Ri Song Guk, se refirio a que los militares del EPC lograron la victoria en la batalla de fuego artillero en la isla Yonphyong con el fuerte fusil del monte Paektu dado por el partido y el lider. 
					
					La isla Yonphyong se ha envuelto en llamas durante dos dias por el fuego certero de nuestros soldados y esta noticia estremecio el mundo entero inspirando la conviccion en la victoria al pueblo coreano y sembrando panico a los enemigos, recordo.
					
					Agrego que en esa batalla los oficiales y soldados de la unidad redoblaron la conviccion de que podran aniquilar a cualquier enemigo porque son guiados por los generales insignes y cuentan con la unidad monolitica entre el ejercito y pueblo. 
					
					El secretario responsable del Comite del Partido del Trabajo de Corea en la Provincia de Hwanghae del Sur, Pak Yong Ho, pronuncio el discurso de felicitacion.
					
					El envio calida felicitacion y saludo a los oficiales y soldados del EPC quienes manifestaron sin reservas la dignidad del poderoso ejercito revolucionario del monte Paektu e infundieron al pueblo la gran fe en la victoria. 
					
					Prosiguio que si los enemigos lanzan siquiera una chispa de fuego contra la patria, todos los habitantes lucharan junto a los militares y lograran la victoria como hace tres anos.
					
					Le siguio en pronunciar la palabra de felicitacion el presidente del Comite de la Federacion General de los Sindicatos de Corea en el Distrito de Kangryong, Ri Jong Ok. 
					
					El recordo que en aquel dia del combate de fuego artillero en la isla Yonphyong, los funcionarios, habitantes y granjeros del distrito visitaron a los militares con los materiales de ayuda para estimularlos. 
					
					Luego, el oficial del EPC, Kim Kyong Su, y el jefe de la dotacion del Canon Heroe, Choe Yong Jin, pronunciaron los discursos de juramento. 
					
					Expusieron la decision de prepararse como artilleros capaces de aniquilar a los enemigos en cualesquier condiciones y asestar el inmediato contraataque demoledor frente a la minima provocacion de los enemigos. 
					
					Terminado el acto, se ofrecio una funcion de la banda de propaganda artistica del 4o cuerpo del EPC.

articles.title: Efectuado en Japon 31o mitin nacional del movimiento en apoyo a reunificacion de Corea
articles.content:
Efectuado en Japon 31o mitin nacional del movimiento en apoyo a reunificacion de Corea
Pyongyang, 25 de noviembre (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 17 en el departamento de Fukuoka de Japon el 31o mitin nacional del movimiento en apoyo a la reunificacion de Corea.
					En la ocasion estuvieron presentes Fumihiro Himori, presidente del Comite Japones de Apoyo a la Reunificacion Independiente y Pacifica de Corea, los miembros del comite ejecutivo del mitin nacional y los delegados de las entidades de amistad de distintas localidades del pais isleno.
					
					Fueron invitados Nam Sung U, vicepresidente del Presidium del Comite Central de la Asociacion General de Coreanos Residentes en Japon (Chongryon), y otros funcionarios de esta entidad coreana ultramarina.
					
					En el mitin, se dieron lectura a los mensajes de felicitacion enviados por la Asociacion Coreana para las Relaciones Culturales con el Extranjero, la Asociacion de Amistad con Corea con sede en Espana, la Asociacion Britanica para la Amistad con Corea y el Comite de Solidaridad de Filipinas para la Paz y la Reunificacion en la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					En su informe de base, el secretario general del Comite Japones de Apoyo a la Reunificacion Independiente y Pacifica de Corea, Kenji Mizutani, condeno la discriminacion cada dia mas recrudescente del gobierno japones contra los coreanos residentes en Japon y exhorto al pueblo japones a contribuir a la reunificacion pacifica de Corea y a la normalizacion de relaciones estatales Japon-Corea.
					
					En la conferencia con el tema "Para la firma del convenio de paz y la normalizacion de relaciones estatales entre Japon y Corea", impartida seguidamente, los oradores condenaron la sucia campana hostil a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea de Japon y las autoridades titeres surcoreanas y la otra para disolver un partido politico progresista y resaltaron la necesidad de mejorar las relaciones entre ambas partes coreanas y entre Japon y Corea.
					
					En el mitin, quedo aprobado un llamamiento que denuncio la violencia fascista de las autoridades surcoreanas contra las fuerzas progresistas y demando a Estados Unidos cambiar el acuerdo de armisticio de Corea por el convenio de paz y a Japon, cancelar las medidas de sancion contra la RPDC.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun critica disparates del alcalde de Osaka sobre la esclavitud sexual
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun critica disparates del alcalde de Osaka sobre la esclavitud sexual
Pyongyang, 25 de noviembre (ACNC) -- Hace poco, el alcalde de Osaka, quien es co-representante del Partido de Restauracion de Japon, dijo sin escrupulos que "en otros paises del mundo existio tambien el problema sexual durante la guerra".
					Su discurso quiere decir que es cuestionada unicamente la esclavitud sexual impuesta por el ex ejercito japones si bien el abuso sexual es delito comun que cometieron los uniformados de otros paises.
					
					Al tratar de igualar la esclavitud sexual con el crimen de violacion sexual cometido por los ejercitos de otros paises, el alcalde japones reconocio sin querer la gravedad, la culpabilidad y la responsabilidad de su pais por el respecto.
					
					Asi senala el diario Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual de este lunes y continua:
					
					Todos los crimenes de abuso sexual reportados en la guerra son delitos antieticos que merecen el castigo penal.
					
					La ley internacional determina el atentado fisico y espiritual contra civiles como crimen de masacre y la esclavitud, la tortura, la prostitucion forzada, etc. como delitos inhumanitarios.
					
					A diferencia de lo que cometieron los ejercitos de otros paises, la esclavitud sexual fue establecida, organizada y ejecutada por el gobierno y el circulo militar de Japon de aquel entonces.
					
					La conversion de 200 mil coreanas en esclavas sexuales habria sido imposible sino hubiera el sistema de represion colonial, fascista y militar de los imperialistas japoneses que controlaban y observaban rigurosamente a todos los habitantes desde el organo central hasta la unidad administrativa de base.
					
					Tanto en vista de los hechos historicos como a la luz de la gravedad de esclavitud sexual, los politicos japoneses no tienen cara para cuestionar a otros paises y deben reflexionar e indemnizar sus crimenes del pasado.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun revela falsedad de reclamo por "mundo sin armas nucleares" de EE.UU.
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun revela falsedad de reclamo por "mundo sin armas nucleares" de EE.UU.
Pyongyang, 25 de noviembre (ACNC) -- El diario Rodong Sinmun, en un articulo individual difundido este lunes, senala que Estados Unidos reclama por el "mundo sin armas nucleares" para poseerlas solo el mismo en este mundo y satisfacer su ambicion dominacionista, y continua:
					Pero no se puede ocultar la falsedad del reclamo del "mundo sin armas nucleares"  preconizado por EE.UU.
					
					Este ano, una entidad civil norteamericana revelo que la administracion norteamericana intenta modernizar durante 25 anos posteriores el arsenal nuclear gastando 60 mil millones US$.
					
					En realidad, EE.UU. acelera la modernizacion de las bombas nucleares "B-61".
					
					Segun trascendidos, en el proceso de la modernizacion las bombas dotaran de un aparato teledirigido.
					
					Se dice que EE.UU. planea gastar hasta el 2024 8 mil 100 millones US$ en la modernizacion de las bombas nucleares "B-61".
					
					EE.UU. realizo en septiembre y diciembre de 2010, febrero de 2011 y diciembre de 2012 las pruebas nucleares subcriticas. Este ano, efectuo varias veces la prueba de analisis de capacidad de armas nucleares que utilizan el plutonio.
					
					A pesar de esto, reclama por el "mundo sin armas nucleares" para poseerlas solo el mismo o ocupar la decisiva y absoluta supremacia de  estos armamentos.
					
					Con esta consigna enganosa, EE.UU. intenta eludir la responsabilidad de la aguda realidad de la confrontacion de armas nucleares.
					
					De esta manera, trata de detener el fortalecimiento de las fuerzas armadas nucleares de varias potencias nucleares y realizar a toda costa la hegemonia mundial  haciendo que otros paises no posean nunca las armas nucleares.
